patthana15.45:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.45:0.3_0: he turns back over the skillful.
patthana15.45:1.1_0: the reprimanding of the mind is not cause or condition for the arising of thought. ...
patthana15.45:2.1_0: Whilewarding off the underlying tendency for the mind, it doesn’t give rise to the unskillful. ...
patthana15.45:2.1_3: (This should be expanded as for the three roots of the following.)
